home.heroTitle: Your all-in-one AI assistant across leading models
home.heroSubtitle: Access frontier models (e.g., GPT‑4o family, Claude 3.5/3.7, Gemini 2.5, Llama 3.1, Mistral Large, DeepSeek‑V3), with custom roles and knowledge-base chat to boost writing, research, and decision-making.
home.heroNote: Available on web, desktop, and mobile. Free tier, no credit card required.

features: Multi-model engine: smart routing or manual switching, balancing quality and cost
Custom AI roles: scenario templates, parameter presets, and memory
Knowledge-base chat: connect docs & web sources, answers with citations
Code & docs assistant: optimization, reviews, and auto-generated docs
Multi-platform: Browser extension (placeholder), Web, macOS, Windows, iOS, Android
advantages: Speed & efficiency: shorten research and writing cycles
Delightful UX: clean design, fast onboarding, team-friendly

features.title: Feature overview
features.description: Bring multi-model, custom roles, and knowledge-base chat into one streamlined workspace.

multiModel.title: Multi-model engine
items: Access frontier models (e.g., GPT‑4o family, Claude 3.5/3.7, Gemini 2.5, Llama 3.1, Mistral Large, DeepSeek‑V3) with smart routing or manual switching
Configurable outputs: length, style, tone, citations
Prompt management: save and reuse high-performing prompts
Note: Actual models and capabilities depend on integrations and licensing

roles.title: Custom AI roles
items: Scenario templates (writing, research, analysis, interviews, code review)
Presets for tone, format, audience; memory for multi-turn conversations
Team role library for shared workflows

kb.title: Knowledge-base chat
items: Connect documents (PDF/Doc), web pages, and data sources
Semantic retrieval with citations for traceable answers
File limits vary by plan and system configuration

code.title: Code & docs assistant
items: Code optimization, reviews, refactoring, and test generation
Auto-generated API/technical docs with embedded examples

content.title: Content & research
items: Structured writing, literature reviews, auto summaries, citations
Bilingual output and localization support

platforms.title: Platforms & extensions
items: Browser extension (placeholder, on roadmap), full access on web/desktop/mobile
Global shortcuts and sidebar availability

security.title: Security & admin
items: Roles/permissions and audit logs (roadmap)
Compliance controls and data retention (enterprise)

free.title: Free tier
items: Start free — no credit card required
Access leading models with smart routing
Generous daily limits for chat and knowledge-base
Import docs, export results, keep your data private
Cancel anytime; upgrade only when it makes sense

footer.note: Model availability and features depend on actual integrations.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing. Start free — no credit card
pricing.tagline: Flexible plans focused on frontier models and productivity. Upgrade only when it makes sense
pricing.feature1: Access to base and frontier models (subject to integrations)
pricing.feature2: Generous daily limits with fair queueing
pricing.feature3: Standard document size and upload limits

success.title: Payment successful
success.subtitle: Thank you for your purchase. Your subscription is being activated.

features: Access to base models (subject to integrations)
Document uploads: up to 5 files, each ≤ 10MB
Priority access to frontier models and higher quotas
Document uploads: up to 100 files, each ≤ 25MB; 2GB storage cap
Higher limits for custom roles and knowledge-base

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Real scenarios across professional workflows
